item.title: Join us for the first Owncast Call of 2021
item.description: We’ll be getting together to chat about Owncast and you’re invited. If you’re currently a user of Owncast, a person who’s interested in being involved, or are just curious what the project is up to, we’d love to have you join us. We’ll be talking about upcoming features, releases, and sharing ideas together on how to make Owncast better. To make sure people who want to attend can make it please mark the date and time that works best for you.
